Up.Statement: update w2_SeoMetadatas set html_title = REPLACE(html_title, 'child_category_top3' , 'child_category_top'), metadata_keywords = REPLACE(metadata_keywords, 'child_category_top3' , 'child_category_top'), metadata_desc = REPLACE(metadata_desc, 'child_category_top3' , 'child_category_top'), comment = REPLACE(CONVERT(nvarchar(4000), comment), 'child_category_top3' , 'child_category_top')
